content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5) 
- Boiler (position -4.5, 23.0) 
- Offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace (position 0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace (position 5, 5)

### Lab at position(-3.5, -9.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -3.5, -9.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that there are no obstructing entities in the path when attempting to connect pipes. Check for placement blockages before trying to connect.

### Errors when using electricity
- Make sure all electrical entities are properly connected to the power network. Check the status of electric poles and ensure they are within range of the entities they are meant to power.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the target position.
